module.name: MERIS Glint Correction
module.description:
The MERIS/AATSR Glint Processor allows for the correction of the influence of the atmosphere and the specularly reflected solar radiation (sun glint) on radiance spectra measured with MERIS and/or AATSR.

Algorithms: R. Doerffer from GKSS Research Centre, C. Brockmann from Brockmann Consult, J. Fischer et al. from Free University of Berlin

Software: M.Peters/O.Danne of Brockmann Consult

Documentation:

  • Glint Correction with MERIS (ATBD 1)
  • Glint Correction with MERIS and AATSR (ATBD 2)
  • Software User Manual (SUM)
module.changelog:
Changes in version 1.4.4
Increased version beam-meris-l2auxdata and flint-processor

Changes in version 1.4.3
[AGC-2] Water leaving irradiance reflectances have wrong unit

Changes in version 1.4
- Integrate salinity and temperature maps

Changes in version 1.3
- updated neural nets - added parameter for water salinity and temperature

Changes in version 1.2.2
[AGC-1] Altitude band is not copied for MER_FSG products if 'beam.envisat.usePixelGeoCoding' is set to true

Changes in version 1.2.1
- reflectances can be written as radiance reflectances or irradiance reflectances - normalised reflectances can be written as additional output

Changes in version 1.2
- added groups for spectral bands - added optional normalization of bidirectional reflectances to nadir - added optional smile corrections - new neural net for MERIS with better frequency distribution of IOPs, extended domain of concentrations and correction for calculation of transmission - Made Glint Correction thread safe - introduce flag agc_flags.INVALID combining agc_flags.LAND, agc_flags.CLOUD_ICE and l1_flags.INVALID - better default expressions for land and cloud/ice detection - copying start and stop time of meris source product

action.shortDescr: Performs a glint correction on the selected Product
action.longDescr: Performs a glint and atmospheric correction over water on the selected Product
